org.apache.james.mailbox.jcr

Class MailboxSessionJCRRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.mailbox.jcr.MailboxSessionJCRRepository
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GlobalMailboxSessionJCRRepository

    public class MailboxSessionJCRRepository
extends Object
    Manage JCR Session. It use the username and the password of the logged in IMAP user to obtain a JCR Session from the Repository
